resources.string:
These instructions can be read at any time in the help menu. Roll the screen, there\'s enough!

miniTruco is a free software trick, played in pairs, with partners face to face. The goal is to make your pair of players reach 12 points before the opponents.

Each player starts with a \"hand\" of three cards and, in turn, choose one to play. The pair that played the highest card wins the round, and the winner starts the next round. Two rounds wins a point by closing the hand.

Value of Cards: Among normal cards, 4 is the lowest card, followed by 5, 6, 7, Q, J, K, A, 2, and 3 is the largest of all, with the suits being indifferent. At the beginning of each hand, a card is turned over pack to choose the shackles - special cards that are worth more that the normal ones, and whose suipes give more or less value: the pica-fumo (♦) is the smallest shackle, followed by sprat (♠), shotgun (♥), and zap (♣). The zap (club shank) is therefore the highest value card about the game.

Increase: In turn, a player may ask \"truco\". If the two opponents They lose their hand, but if at least one accepts, the hand Worth 3 points. An opponent may, in turn, request \"six\", \"nine\" or \"twelve\", increasing the bet in the same way for these values.

Draw: A tie in the first or second round is decided by the round following. A tie after the first is decided by the result of the first.

Hand of 11: If one of the doubles makes 11 points (but the other does not), his members can view their partner\'s cards before starting the game. If one of them accept to play, the hand is worth 3 points. If they both refuse, the the opposing team wins a point, and a new hand is dealt, using the same rules.

Bluetooth: A cell phone should create the game, and up to three look for it. It is advisable to pair the mobiles first. Who created the game can rearrange the positions before starting. Hand of 11 is not yet supported, and Java ME phones still do not connect 100%.

Options : n this menu, you can choose a "clean" (without cards 4, 5, 6 and 7) or by the old shackle, that is, the shackles being always 7 ♦ (lower), A ♠, 7 ♥ and 4 ♣ (higher). The old shackle also allows the counting of points (goals) of the mining trick (4, 8, 10 and 12 points in the increases and "hand of 11" in the 10 points).
